DOC.brief_summary: The primary aim of this proposal is to test the effectiveness of neuromuscular electrical stimulation (NMES) in improving functional status and muscle function in patients receiving prolonged mechanical ventilation.
DOC.brief_title: Facilitating Functional Independence in Patients Receiving Prolonged Mechanical Ventilation
